faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to your questions about our services

items.question: What is CRM and why is it important?
items.answer: CRM (Customer Relationship Management) is a system for managing customer relationships. It optimizes your sales processes by collecting all customer data in one place, increases customer satisfaction and enhances business efficiency.

items.question: What can you do with Zoho CRM?
items.answer: With Zoho CRM, you can centrally manage customer data, track sales funnel, get automatic reports, do email marketing, and access from anywhere with mobile app. It also integrates with 40+ Zoho applications.

items.question: How long does CRM integration take?
items.answer: While it varies according to project scope, a standard CRM setup is completed in 2-4 weeks. This process includes data migration, customizations, testing phase and team training.

items.question: How does a website become SEO compatible?
items.answer: We bring your website to the top rankings in search engines with technical SEO optimization, keyword research, content optimization, site speed improvements and Google Analytics setup.

items.question: Do you provide post-project support?
items.answer: Yes, we provide free technical support for 6 months to 1 year in all our projects. During this process, you can get support for system updates, minor changes and technical issues.

items.question: What is your pricing model?
items.answer: We work with a project-based fixed price model. We prepare a customized offer for you after needs analysis. Payment plans are flexible and we offer installment options according to project phases.

items.question: Which sectors do you serve?
items.answer: We have experience in technology, healthcare, education, retail, consulting and service sectors. We develop solutions suitable for the specific needs of each sector.

items.question: Do you have remote working capability?
items.answer: Yes, we can provide all our services remotely. We successfully manage your projects with online meetings, screen sharing and remote access tools. We can also provide on-site support when necessary.
